name: Hollow Knight: Silksong
summary: Very beautiful and charming, but the balance is stupid. I despise runbacks being a part of game design.
pros: Improves over Hollow Knight in every way IMO
cons: Too difficult for a casual player like me
Stupid runbacks are bad game design IMO (looking at you, last judge)
Enemies doing too much damage and health being so low doesn't make it all too fun
